markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animalistic Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2492) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your animalistic connections help you resist natural afflictions. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves to resist [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126).
name: Animalistic Resistance
